moves.1... e5 2. Nc3 Qf6 3. e4 Bc5: open up obvious scholars mate position
moves.5. Nge2 Ng4: play an attempted sacrificial move to get mate
moves.6... exd4 7. Nd5: knight creates a fork of the queen and pawn on c7 that would create another fork and win the rook but i dont see this
moves.8... Qxg4: this move should have been spent protecting c7
moves.10. Nxa8 Qxe4: i attempt to gain a good position
moves.11. b3: that move ends up a very bad move
moves.15... Qxd4:
i take knight and guess what he does

a)defends rook 

b) check
moves.16... f6:
guess what he does next

a) defends rook

moves.17... Qxa1+:
i take rook, as i said earlier, b3 was not a bad move but it did allow me to win eventually.  

some people would have advised pinning the queen but that would have lost a rook giving me four points but this won me the game
